t: 1 Chronicles 6
The Levites
Levi’s*ln sons: Gershom, Kohath, and Merari.
Kohath’s*ln sons: Amram, Izhar, Hebron, and Uzziel.
Amram’s*ln children: Aaron, Moses, and Miriam. Aaron’s*ln sons: Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.
Eleazar*ln fathered Phinehas; Phinehas*ln fathered Abishua;
Abishua*ln fathered Bukki; Bukki*ln fathered Uzzi;
Uzzi*ln fathered Zerahiah; Zerahiah*ln fathered Meraioth;
Meraioth*ln fathered Amariah; Amariah*ln fathered Ahitub;
Ahitub*ln fathered Zadok; Zadok*ln fathered Ahimaaz;
Ahimaaz*ln fathered Azariah; Azariah*ln fathered Johanan;
Johanan*ln fathered Azariah, who served as priest in the temple that Solomon built in Jerusalem;
Azariah*ln fathered Amariah; Amariah*ln fathered Ahitub;
Ahitub*ln fathered Zadok; Zadok*ln fathered Shallum;
Shallum*ln fathered Hilkiah; Hilkiah*ln fathered Azariah;
Azariah*ln fathered Seraiah; and*ln Seraiah fathered Jehozadak.
Jehozadak*ln went into exile when the Lord*s sent Judah and Jerusalem into exile at the hands of Nebuchadnezzar.
Levi’s*ln sons: Gershom, Kohath, and Merari.
These*ln are the names of Gershom’s sons: Libni and Shimei.
Kohath’s*ln sons: Amram, Izhar, Hebron and Uzziel.
Merari’s*ln sons: Mahli and Mushi. These*ln are the Levites’ families according to their fathers:
Of*ln Gershom: his son Libni, his*ln son Jahath, his son Zimmah,
his*ln son Joah, his son Iddo, his*ln son Zerah, and his son Jeatherai.
Kohath’s*ln sons: his son Amminadab, his*ln son Korah, his son Assir,
his*ln son Elkanah, his son Ebiasaph, his*ln son Assir,
his son Tahath, his*ln son Uriel, his son Uzziah, and*ln his son Shaul.
Elkanah’s*ln sons: Amasai and Ahimoth,
his*ln son Elkanah, his son Zophai, his*ln son Nahath,
his son Eliab, his*ln son Jeroham, and his son Elkanah.
Samuel’s*ln sons: his firstborn Joel, and*ln his second son Abijah.
Merari’s*ln sons: Mahli, his son Libni, his*ln son Shimei, his son Uzzah,
his*ln son Shimea, his son Haggiah, and*ln his son Asaiah.
The Musicians
These*p are the men David put in charge of the music in the Lord’s*s temple after the ark came to rest there.

They ministered with song in front of the tabernacle, the tent of meeting, until Solomon built the Lord’s*s temple in Jerusalem, and they performed their task according to the regulations given to them.
These are the men who served with their sons. From*ln the Kohathites: Heman the singer, son*ln of Joel, son of Samuel,
son*ln of Elkanah, son of Jeroham, son*ln of Eliel, son of Toah,
son*ln of Zuph, son of Elkanah, son*ln of Mahath, son of Amasai,
son*ln of Elkanah, son of Joel, son*ln of Azariah, son of Zephaniah,
son*ln of Tahath, son of Assir, son*ln of Ebiasaph, son of Korah,
son*ln of Izhar, son of Kohath, son*ln of Levi, son of Israel.
Heman’s*ln relative was Asaph, who stood at his right hand: Asaph*ln son of Berechiah, son of Shimea,
son*ln of Michael, son of Baaseiah, son*ln of Malchijah,
son of Ethni, son*ln of Zerah, son of Adaiah,
son*ln of Ethan, son of Zimmah, son*ln of Shimei,
son of Jahath, son*ln of Gershom, son of Levi.
On*ln the left, their relatives were Merari’s sons: Ethan*ln son of Kishi, son of Abdi, son*ln of Malluch,
son of Hashabiah, son*ln of Amaziah, son of Hilkiah,
son*ln of Amzi, son of Bani, son*ln of Shemer,
son of Mahli, son*ln of Mushi, son of Merari, son*ln of Levi.
Aaron’s Descendants
Their*p relatives, the Levites, were assigned to all the service of the tabernacle, God’s temple.

But Aaron and his sons did all the work of the most holy place. They presented the offerings on the altar of burnt offerings and on the altar of incense to make atonement for Israel according to all that Moses the servant of God had commanded.
These*ln are Aaron’s sons: his son Eleazar, his*ln son Phinehas, his son Abishua,
his*ln son Bukki, his son Uzzi, his*ln son Zerahiah,
his son Meraioth, his*ln son Amariah, his son Ahitub,
his*ln son Zadok, and his son Ahimaaz.
The Settlements of the Levites
These*p were the places assigned to Aaron’s descendants from the Kohathite family for their settlements in their territory, because the first lot was for them.
They were given Hebron in the land of Judah and its surrounding pasturelands,
but the fields and settlements around the city were given to Caleb son of Jephunneh.
Aaron’s descendants were given: Hebron*p (a city of refuge), Libnah and its pasturelands, Jattir, Eshtemoa and its pasturelands,
Hilen and its pasturelands, Debir and its pasturelands,
Ashan and its pasturelands, and Beth-shemesh and its pasturelands.
From the tribe of Benjamin they were given Geba and its pasturelands, Alemeth and its pasturelands, and Anathoth and its pasturelands. They had thirteen towns in all among their families.
To*p the rest of the Kohathites, ten towns from half the tribe of Manasseh were assigned by lot.
The*p Gershomites were assigned thirteen towns from the tribes of Issachar, Asher, Naphtali, and Manasseh in Bashan according to their families.
The*p Merarites were assigned by lot twelve towns from the tribes of Reuben, Gad, and Zebulun according to their families.
So the Israelites gave these towns and their pasturelands to the Levites.
They assigned by lot the towns named above from the tribes of the descendants of Judah, Simeon, and Benjamin.
Some*p of the families of the Kohathites were given towns from the tribe of Ephraim for their territory:
Shechem*p (a city of refuge) with its pasturelands in the hill country of Ephraim, Gezer and its pasturelands,
Jokmeam and its pasturelands, Beth-horon and its pasturelands,
Aijalon and its pasturelands, and Gath-rimmon and its pasturelands.
From half the tribe of Manasseh, Aner and its pasturelands, and Bileam and its pasturelands were given to the rest of the families of the Kohathites.
The*p Gershomites received: Golan*p in Bashan and its pasturelands, and Ashtaroth and its pasturelands from the families of half the tribe of Manasseh.
From the tribe of Issachar they received Kedesh and its pasturelands, Daberath and its pasturelands,
Ramoth and its pasturelands, and Anem and its pasturelands.
From the tribe of Asher they received Mashal and its pasturelands, Abdon and its pasturelands,
Hukok and its pasturelands, and Rehob and its pasturelands.
From the tribe of Naphtali they received Kedesh in Galilee and its pasturelands, Hammon and its pasturelands, and Kiriathaim and its pasturelands.
The*p rest of the Merarites received: From*p the tribe of Zebulun they received Rimmono and its pasturelands and Tabor and its pasturelands.
From the tribe of Reuben across the Jordan at Jericho, to the east of the Jordan, they received Bezer in the desert and its pasturelands, Jahzah and its pasturelands,
Kedemoth and its pasturelands, and Mephaath and its pasturelands.
From the tribe of Gad they received Ramoth in Gilead and its pasturelands, Mahanaim and its pasturelands,
Heshbon and its pasturelands, and Jazer and its pasturelands.
